<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Greatest Hits (2009) | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/bruce-springsteen-the-e-street-band-greatest-hits/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Greatest Hits (2009)" />
<meta property="og:description" content="The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release. Dropping material recorded between between Born in the U.S.A. and the E Street reunion, it adds songs from The Rising and Magic and, unlike 1995's Greatest Hits, offers a pre-Born to Run favorite, "Rosalita." A European version with an alternative tracklist was later released." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/bruce-springsteen-the-e-street-band-greatest-hits/" />

<meta name="twitter:description" content="The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release. Dropping material recorded between between Born in the U.S.A. and the E Street reunion, it adds songs from The Rising and Magic and, unlike 1995's Greatest Hits, offers a pre-Born to Run favorite, "Rosalita." A European version with an alternative tracklist was later released." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2009/01/og-springsteen-greatesthits-2009-front.jpg" />

yoast_head_json.title: Greatest Hits (2009) | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release.
yoast_head_json.og_description: The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release. Dropping material recorded between between Born in the U.S.A. and the E Street reunion, it adds songs from The Rising and Magic and, unlike 1995's Greatest Hits, offers a pre-Born to Run favorite, "Rosalita." A European version with an alternative tracklist was later released.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: The only compilation album crediting the E Street Band, Greatest Hits was an exclusive Wal-Mart release. Dropping material recorded between between Born in the U.S.A. and the E Street reunion, it adds songs from The Rising and Magic and, unlike 1995's Greatest Hits, offers a pre-Born to Run favorite, "Rosalita." A European version with an alternative tracklist was later released.
